snippet: Tyson Clabo, an offensive tackle for the Falcons, has only nice words in response to needling by Justin Tuck of the Giants.
abstract: Tyson Clabo, an offensive tackle for the Falcons, has only nice words in response to needling by Justin Tuck of the Giants.
lead_paragraph: FLOWERY BRANCH, Ga. -- After the crowd of reporters disbanded from in front of his locker here Wednesday, Tyson Clabo, the Atlanta Falcons offensive tackle, said he wished he could have been more creative with his answer to the controversy of the day, but that he did not have time.

headline.main: Falcons' Clabo Laughs Off Jab from Tuck
